infos.value: This was all you could muster, was it? Pathetic.
Seize Glaciela. Kill the rest for all I care.
What now, Lady Glaciela?
At this rate—!
I see even you underestimate me. That will make their entrance all the grander.
Huh...?
We have incoming reinforcements.
But, who...?
...Sorry to keep you waiting.
Who are you!?
I'm Cadia, Lady Glaciela's little sister.
What? Is this true?
We have different fathers, but yes.
I see. Half-siblings, then?
Precisely. I look forward to working with you!
And my name is Meriluke.
I used to belong to Wezette's army, but it's since grown too detestable to ally with.
I wandered adrift for some time, but Lady Glaciela found me and trained me up to what you see before you.
Lady Glaciela...why are they here?
They are part of my private brigade, «Spirare».
Private brigade!?
It's as she says.
I guess you could call us her secret weapon!
This is unlike you, Lady Glaciela. Hiding a maneuver as big as this...
Are you not forgetting someone?
Lady Miranda! What a relief to see you unscathed!
We have made it this far thanks to you.
You have my sincerest gratitude.
...Of course. But the real battle is just beginning.
I take it...you shan't be surrendering?
Serjes...
This battle will lead to spilt blood—to the needless loss of many lives.
Even if it meant preventing such an outcome...
I shall not prostrate myself before a dictator who treats his subjects like worms!
I shall strike down Khury and end this insufferably long winter that plagues Wezette still.
Then...there is naught else to be done but fight.
We shall settle who is just...here and now.
For Minwu!
